data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Juarez have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Camilo Sanvezzo is on target to give Mazatlan a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 5, Great play from Martin Rodriguez to set up the goal.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Mazatlan.
Goal! The home team extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a penalty from Israel Jimenez.
In the minute 10, Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Juarez.
Jose Jaoquin Esquivel for Juarez has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
Luis Mendoza is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Luis Mendoza is back on his feet again.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez.
Free kick Juarez.
In the minute 26, In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Mazatlan Mazatlan attack through Luis Mendoza. The finish is off target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 33, Luis Hernandez (Juarez) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Camilo Sanvezzo extends Mazatlan lead to 3-0 with a header.
In the minute 36, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Brian Rubio pulls one back to make it 3-1.
In the minute 41, Francisco Palencia (Mazatlan) is making a first substitution, with Carlos Vargas replacing Nicolas Diaz.
Free kick Juarez.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 44, At Estadio de Mazatlan, Mario Osuna has been yellow-carded for the home team.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Juarez.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 45, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Mazatlan.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 48, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
In the minute 54, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Free kick Mazatlan.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roberto Meraz is replacing Camilo Sanvezzo for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
The away team have replaced Blas Armoa with Dario Lezcano. This is the first substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
In the minute 57, Mazatlan make their second substitution with Fernando Aristeguieta replacing Luis Mendoza.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Juarez, close to Mazatlan's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mazatlan.
In the minute 61, Maximiliano Olivera (Juarez) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Juarez throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
In Mazatlan, Eryc Castillo of Juarez is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Maximiliano Olivera with Alan Mendoza.
Flavio Santos is replacing Francisco Contreras for the away team.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 74, Candido Ramirez is on a sub for Efrain Velarde for Mazatlan.
Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal is replacing Israel Jimenez for the home team.
Gabriel Caballero is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with William Mendieta replacing Marco Fabian.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 76, Gabriel Caballero is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Jesus Zavala replacing Jose Jaoquin Esquivel.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 77, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Eryc Castillo (Juarez) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-2 at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Juarez.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Mazatlan just outside Juarez's area.
Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mazatlan's half?
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mazatlan are whistled for offside.
Free kick in a good position for Mazatlan!
Throw-in for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
